text:
The code for working with pictures was rewritten.
Now HSLF can work with all image formats supported by PowerPoint:
JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF and PICT.

The patch includes the updated documentation and unit tests.


Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
yegor@dinom.ru
